comment: Prof Kim is sweet, charismatic, knowledgable, and makes herself available to her students during and after class. She is Korean and does have an accent, but that is no reason to condemn her teaching ability. You will have to read and take notes in and out of class. Don't expect to be spoon fed and retain the info based on 1 lecture. Do your part!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Tests were taken directly from the powerpoints but even with a cheat sheet our class average was in the 70's. She will not give alternative examples and is very hard to understand.
